io.doov.core.dsl.time

Class LocalDateSuppliers

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.doov.core.dsl.time.LocalDateSuppliers

  • public class LocalDateSuppliers
extends java.lang.Object
    Common and useful local date suppliers. You can mock the clock by using setClock(Clock).

    • Method Summary
